name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ScreenSheet - Screenshots to xlsx, csv and more

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Transform screenshots into spreadsheets in one click

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of manually copying tables? We've got you covered.

ScreenSheet is your go-to solution for turning any visual data into actionable insights.
Transform screenshots into spreadsheets in one click.

🚀 Key Features 🚀

📸 Smart Capture & Extract → Easily select any area on your screen and instantly convert it into a table. Simple, fast, and user-friendly

🧠 Intelligent Data Conversion → Analyze and structure data from various visual formats, ensuring accurate tabular extraction.

📂 Versatile Output Formats → Extract and convert data into xlsx, csv, md, and json formats for seamless integration with your workflow.

🔗 Easy Download & Share → Copy or download extracted data in a single click. Share with your team or save it for later.


🧩Why Choose ScreenSheet?🧩

✅ Save Hours of Manual Data Entry: What used to take hours now takes seconds.
✅ Enhance Data Accuracy: Eliminate human errors in data transcription.
✅ Boost Your Productivity: Streamline your research and data analysis processes.
✅ Versatile Applications: Perfect for financial analysis, academic research, business intelligence, and more.


🕹️How It Works🕹️

1️⃣ Select the area on your screen containing the data you want to extract.
2️⃣ Click the convert icon to capture and process the image.
3️⃣ Review the extracted data and choose your preferred output format.
4️⃣ Copy, download, or directly integrate the data with your favorite tools.


Whether you're dealing with financial reports, research papers, or complex datasets, ScreenSheet simplifies your data extraction process, allowing you to focus on what truly matters - analyzing and utilizing your data.

Try ScreenSheet today and experience the future of data extraction!
